meanings.sent1: Her formidabilities in the debate made everyone respect her.
meanings.sent2: The mountain's formidabilities were evident in its sheer size and steep cliffs.
meanings.sent3: The kitten's formidabilities included its ability to knock things off shelves with precision.
meanings.sent4: The formidabilities of the storm were felt by all as it unleashed its fury.
meanings.sent5: The formidabilities of the dragon were legendary, striking fear into the hearts of all who encountered it.

meanings.definition: Things that cause fear or awe.
meanings.sent1: The dark forest was full of formidabilities that sent shivers down his spine.
meanings.sent2: The formidabilities of the haunted house made it a popular Halloween attraction.
meanings.sent3: The formidabilities of the roller coaster were both terrifying and thrilling for the riders.
meanings.sent4: The formidabilities of the deep ocean were explored by brave divers seeking adventure.
meanings.sent5: The formidabilities of the ancient castle captured the imagination of all who visited.
